entities.description: How adults feel about trying marijuana or any cannabis product once or twice.
Number of times the respondent attended religious services in the past 12 months.
The extent to which the respondent's religious beliefs are considered very important in their life.
The influence of religious beliefs on the respondent's decision-making process.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's attitude towards adults trying marijuana or cannabis products once or twice.
Indicates the number of times the respondent attended religious services in the past 12 months.
Indicates how important religious beliefs are in the respondent's life.
Indicates the influence of religious beliefs on the respondent's decision-making process.
